panels.description: Top 5 Endpoints with higher percentage of client requests for which the response status code is 4XX or 5XX
panels.title: Top 5 Endpoints by Errors

panels.description: The number of client requests served by the HTTP/S proxy
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: The number of client requests served by the HTTP/S proxy grouped by country
panels.title: Requests by country

panels.description: The number of client requests served by the HTTP/S proxy grouped by status group
panels.title: Requests by status

panels.description: The number of bytes sent as requests/responses from clients to AFDX and from HTTP/S proxy to clients.
panels.title: Request/Responses size

panels.description: The time calculated from when the client request was received by the HTTP/S proxy until the client acknowledged the last response byte from the HTTP/S proxy	TotalLatency
panels.title: Total latency

panels.description: The percentage of successful health probes from AFDX to backends.
panels.title: Origin Health percentage

panels.description: The time calculated from when the request was sent by AFDX edge to the backend until AFDX received the last response byte from the backend.
panels.title: Origin Latency average

panels.description: The number of bytes sent as requests from clients to AFDX.
panels.title: Requests size

panels.description: The number of bytes sent as responses from HTTP/S proxy to clients.
panels.title: Responses size

panels.description: The time calculated from when the client request was received by the HTTP/S proxy until the client acknowledged the last response byte from the HTTP/S proxy	TotalLatency
panels.title: Total latency

targets.expr:
avg by (job, resourceGroup, subscriptionName, dimensionEndpoint) (azure_microsoft_cdn_profiles_percentage4xx_average_percent{dimensionEndpoint!="",job="integrations/azure",job=~"$job",resourceGroup=~"$resourceGroup",subscriptionName=~"$subscriptionName"}) + avg by (job, resourceGroup, subscriptionName, dimensionEndpoint) (azure_microsoft_cdn_profiles_percentage5xx_average_percent{dimensionEndpoint!="",job="integrations/azure",job=~"$job",resourceGroup=~"$resourceGroup",subscriptionName=~"$subscriptionName"})
or
avg by (job, resourceGroup, subscriptionName, dimension_Endpoint) (azure_microsoft_cdn_profiles_percentage4xx_average_percent{dimension_Endpoint!="",job="integrations/azure",job=~"$job",resourceGroup=~"$resourceGroup",subscriptionName=~"$subscriptionName"}) + avg by (job, resourceGroup, subscriptionName, dimension_Endpoint) (azure_microsoft_cdn_profiles_percentage5xx_average_percent{dimension_Endpoint!="",job="integrations/azure",job=~"$job",resourceGroup=~"$resourceGroup",subscriptionName=~"$subscriptionName"})

panels.description: The number of requests sent from AFDX to origin.
panels.title: Origin Request count

panels.description: The time calculated from when the request was sent by AFDX edge to the backend until AFDX received the last response byte from the backend.
panels.title: Origin Latency average
